title: Geometric Sans
content:
Hello, all –

Can anyone identify the font(s) used in the attached logo? It’s (they’re) quite similar to Futura, but the x-height is bigger and some of the characters are more condensed. (Disproportionally so, IMO.)

Any insight is appreciated …

Thanks – Keith.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107234452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UCCIBlogo_4519.jpg)
author: KCH

comments.content:
Levenim MT Bold (result from Find My Font)

Century Gothic is also close
